channel.title: Is there any way I can earn a job with my hacking skills through certificates and programs without going to college
channel.description: if there's any way out please let me know Would appreciate it ! I personally think colleges are baseless and I don't wanna waste my 4 years of life running for a degree.

item.title: Is there any way I can earn a job with my hacking skills through certificates and programs without going to college
item.dc:creator: MrQbits
item.description:
Yes, you can learn hacking on your own and you can also get a better job. You also don’t need a college to get a job. Look bruh, hacking is not any degree, it’s an attitude to learn and break systems. If you will become expert in this attitude then you don’t need college degree to show off.

hacking is not a degree, its a power of you.

But you can try some certs like OSCP, CEH and GIAC etc.

Read full topic
